title: Ranil Wickremesinghe sworn in as new Prime Minister
body_lines: The Leader of the United National Party (UNP), Ranil Wickremesinghe has been sworn in as the new Prime Minister of Sri Lanka.
Wickremesinghe took oath before President Gotabaya Rajapaksa at the President’s House in Colombo this evening (May 12).
Secretary to the President Gamini Senarath and Prof. Maithree Wickramasinghe were also present on the occasion.
Wickremesinghe has served as Prime Minister of Sri Lanka on five previous occasions.
